body.p: The following per-machine VM extradata settings can be used to change the behavior of the VM selector window in respect of certain VMs:
property can be any of the following:

dd.p: Do not show the VM configuration of a certain VM. The details window will remain just empty if this VM is selected.
Do not allow the user to open the Settings dialog for a certain VM.
Prevent snapshot operations for a VM from the GUI, either at runtime or when the VM is powered off.
Hide a certain VM in the VM selector window.
Disable the automatic update check and hide the corresponding menu item.

body.p: Note that these settings do not prevent the user from reconfiguring the VM by using the VBoxManage modifyvm command.
